title: When you lose an epic battle of skill, but the enemy says "GG EZ" at the end

replies.body:
Urgot and Fiora are very differant champions. One of them is sexy beyond all reason, has beautiful curves, and is every fans dream. The other is Fiora.
https://themidnightalliance.files.wordpress.com/2012/06/you-know-im-right.gif

They're also master duelists.
{{champion:6}} {{item:3046}} 27% pure reduction.
Sp00ky

> UNIQUE â€“ LAMENT: Grants 12% damage reduction against the last enemy champion hit (ends after 10 seconds out-of-combat).

Only for the last enemy champion hit.
His ultimate on max rank grants 50% damage reduction though.

> PASSIVE -- Zaun-Touched Bolt Augmenter: Reduces damage dealt by targets of basic attacks or Acid Hunter by 15% for 2.5 seconds. 

27% Damage reduction from your last target hit. This means he takes guaranteed 27% reduced damage when dueling.
Unfortunately not, they stack multiplicatively. So .85*.88= .748= 25.2% dmg reduction. 63.6% with ultimate! ...

> [{quoted}](name=Laughing Fish,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=yrrRRv7a,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-08-01T20:16:51.871+0000)
>
> Urgot and Fiora are very differant champions. One of them is sexy beyond all reason, has beautiful curves, and is every fans dream. The other is Fiora.
> https://themidnightalliance.files.wordpress.com/2012/06/you-know-im-right.gif

http://gifsec.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/03/Never-GIF.gif

12/10

Would let Fiora blast me off again.

it is cuz people think is cool to taunt and be an assclown to say GG EZ when end of game was 50 mins long, every one is full build and the amount of kills are dead even. its like come on. what happen to good sportsmanship? what happen to walking down the 50 yr line and shaking hands after a hard fought game and looking your enemy in the eyes and saying good game. there is no honor, there is no maturity. 

and saying gg ez is just bad manners. BE HONORABLE UPON THE FIELD OF BATTLE. i dont care if its on the football field/ pitch (for the rest of the world) baseball diamond, track, poker table, wrestling mat, basketball court. GROW THE FUK UP AND BE  MAN. 

HONORABLE OPPONENT: HUMBLE IN VICTORY, GRACEFUL IN DEFEAT. Any Summoner you would enjoy playing with or against in a future battle.
I want that crab to be a champion.
that crab is a champ he is named urgot {{champion:6}} {{champion:6}} {{champion:6}} {{champion:6}} {{champion:6}} {{champion:6}} {{champion:6}}
When an "Ez" game for your enemy is 50 minutes long. Smh
It's moments like that.. That fill my heart with sadness and rage simultaneously.
